title: Dual-Fin Budgeting Web App
description: A collaborative web application designed specifically for couples to track shared and individual expenses. Features real-time synchronization, automated transaction categorization, and visual debt payoff planning.

title: ZenLift Workout Tracker (Mobile)
description: A minimalist mobile app for logging weightlifting and cardio sessions. Key features include a customizable exercise library, progress visualization (1RM calculation), and a rest timer with haptic feedback.

title: Mercury: macOS Animation Manager
description: A small macOS utility built to enhance user experience by **removing those annoying macOS timely animations** (e.g., resizing windows, launching apps), resulting in instant, snappier window management and system responsiveness.

title: Retinafy: HIDPI Resolution Tool
description: A system tool designed to enable **Retina display-like resolution on standard resolution screens** (like FHD, QHD, or 4K monitors) by forcing macOS into a HiDPI mode, significantly increasing display sharpness and pixel density.

title: Lumina Code Snippet Manager
description: A lightweight, local-first web application for storing, tagging, and quickly searching coding snippets. Includes syntax highlighting, markdown support, and seamless import/export functionality.
